com.teamwork.autocomplete

Class MultiAutoComplete.Build

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamwork.autocomplete.MultiAutoComplete.Build
  • Enclosing interface:
    MultiAutoComplete

    public static class MultiAutoComplete.Build
extends java.lang.Object
    Static factory helper methods to construct an instance of MultiAutoComplete with default parameters.

    The TokenFilter implementations set by this methods will match the current constraint with the value returned by the Object.toString() method of the passed items.

    See Also:
    BaseTokenFilter

    • Method Detail

      • from

        @NonNull
public static MultiAutoComplete from(@NonNull
                                              java.util.List<SimpleItem> items)
        Build an instance of MultiAutoComplete from the passed list of SimpleItems with the default UI. The auto complete will be triggered at every space-prefixed character, on each comma-separated value.

        Use this method to implement if no handle, customization of the layout, data type or filtering is required.

        Parameters:
        items - The List of items to display (only the text will be shown).
        Returns:
        The built MultiAutoComplete instance.
        See Also:
        SimpleItem, SimpleItemViewBinder, SimpleTokenFilter

      • from

        @NonNull
public static MultiAutoComplete from(char handle,
                                              @NonNull
                                              java.util.List<SimpleItem> items)
        Build an instance of MultiAutoComplete from the passed list of SimpleItems with the default UI. The auto complete will be triggered by the passed char handle.

        Use this method to implement if no customization of the layout, data type or filtering is required.

        Parameters:
        handle - The character handle that will trigger the auto complete drop down.
        items - The List of items to display (only the text will be shown).
        Returns:
        The built MultiAutoComplete instance.
        See Also:
        SimpleItem, SimpleItemViewBinder

      • from

        @NonNull
public static <M> MultiAutoComplete from(char handle,
                                                  @NonNull
                                                  AutoCompleteViewBinder<M> viewBinder,
                                                  @NonNull
                                                  java.util.List<M> items)
        Build an instance of MultiAutoComplete from the passed list of item models and a layout provided by a custom view binder. The auto complete will be triggered by the passed char handle.

        Use this method to implement if no customization of the filtering and tokenizer is required.

        Parameters:
        handle - The character handle that will trigger the auto complete drop down.
        viewBinder - An AutoCompleteViewBinder to provide a custom layout and data binding.
        items - The List of items to use as data set.
        Returns:
        The built MultiAutoComplete instance.
